trans-unit.source: Authorized form of name - This is a mandatory element.
Are you sure you want to delete %1%?
Acquisition date - This is a mandatory element.
Source of acquisition - This is a mandatory element.
Location information - This is a mandatory element.

trans-unit.target: Adaugati o noua sesiune de inregistrare

trans-unit.source: You are creating an accrual to accession %1%
Accession number should be a combination of values recorded in the field and should be a unique accession number for the repository
trans-unit.target: Numărul de aderare ar trebui să fie o combinație de valori înregistrate în domeniu și un număr unic de aderare pentru depozit.

trans-unit.source: Accession date represents the date of receipt of the materials and is added during the donation process.
trans-unit.target: Data de aderare reprezintă data primirii materialelor și se adaugă în timpul procesului de donare.

trans-unit.source: Identify immediate source of acquisition or transfer, and date and method of acquisition IF the information is NOT confidential.
trans-unit.target: Identificati sursa imediată de achiziție sau de transfer, data și metoda de achiziție dacă informațiile nu sunt confidențiale.

trans-unit.source: A description of the physical location in the repository where the accession can be found.
trans-unit.target: Descriere a locului fizic a depozitului în care aderarea poate fi găsită.

trans-unit.source: Term describing the type of accession transaction and referring to the way in which the accession was acquired.
trans-unit.target: Termen care descrie tipul de aderare a tranzactiei și care se referă la modul în care a fost achiziționat.

trans-unit.source: Select the type of resource represented in the accession, either public or private.
trans-unit.target: Selectați tipul de resursa reprezentata în procesul de aderare, fie publice sau private.

trans-unit.source: The title of the accession, usually the creator name and term describing the format of the accession materials.
trans-unit.target: Titlul de aderare,de obicei descrie numele creatorului si formatul materialelor de aderare.

trans-unit.source: The name of the creator of the accession or the name of the department that created the accession.
trans-unit.target: Numele creatorului de aderare sau numele departamentului care a realizat aderarea.

trans-unit.source: "Identify and record the date(s) of the unit of description. Identify the type of date given. Record as a single date or a range of dates as appropriate.” (ISAD 3.1.3). The Date display field can be used to enter free-text date information, including typographical marks to express approximation, uncertainty, or qualification. Use the start and end fields to make the dates searchable. Do not use any qualifiers or typographical symbols to express uncertainty. Acceptable date formats: YYYYMMDD, YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, YYYY.

Information on the history of the accession. When the accession is acquired directly from the creator, do not record an archival history but record the information as the Immediate Source of Acquisition.
trans-unit.target: Informații despre istoria aderării. În cazul în care aderarea este achiziționata direct de la creator, nu se înregistreaza o istorie de arhiva, dar se înregistreaza informația ca sursa imediata de achiziție.

trans-unit.source: A description of the intellectual content and document types represented in the accession.
trans-unit.target: Descriere a continutului intelectual si a tipurilor de documente reprezentate in procesul de aderare.

trans-unit.source: Record appraisal, destruction and scheduling actions taken on or planned for the unit of description, especially if they may affect the interpretation of the material.
trans-unit.target: Inregistrare acțiuni de evaluare, distrugere și programare luate sau planificate pentru unitatea de descriere, mai ales în cazul în care acestea pot afecta interpretarea materialului.

trans-unit.source: A description of the physical condition of the accession and if any preservation or special handling is required.
trans-unit.target: In cazul descrierii starii fizice a aderarii este necesara consevarea sau o manipulare speciala

trans-unit.source: The number of units as a whole number and the measurement of the received volume of records in the accession.
trans-unit.target: Numărul de unități ca un număr întreg și măsurarea volumului de înregistrări primit în procesul de aderare.

trans-unit.source: An indicator of the accessioning process.
Indicates the priority the repository assigns to completing the processing of the accession.
trans-unit.target: Indica prioritatea depozitului ce atribuie finalizarea procesarii aderarii.

trans-unit.source: Notes about the processing plan, describing what needs to be done for the accession to be processed completely.
trans-unit.target: Note cu privire la planul de prelucrare, care descrie ceea ce trebuie făcut pentru ca aderarea să fie procesata complet.

trans-unit.source: It has %1% deaccessions that will also be deleted:
It has %1% accruals. They will not be deleted.
Identifier - This is a mandatory element.
Date of acquisition - This is a mandatory element.
Scope - This is a mandatory element.
Description - This is a mandatory element.
Identify if the whole accession is being deaccessioned or if only a part of the accession is being deaccessioned.
Identify what materials are being deaccessioned.
The number of units as a whole number and the measurement of the records to be deaccessioned.
Provide a reason why the records are being deaccessioned.
Server error while checking identifer availability.
This identifer is already in use.

Type: Enter a name for the alternative identifier field that indicates its purpose and usage.
Identifier: Enter a legacy reference code, alternative identifier, or any other alpha-numeric string associated with the record.
%1%Type:%2% Select the type of the event.%3%
%1%Date:%2% Enter the date of the event.%3%
%1%Agent:%2% Enter the agent associated with the event.%3%
%1%Note:%2% Enter notes associated with the event.%3%

This is the legal entity field and provides the contact information for the person(s) or the institution that donated or transferred the materials. It has the option of multiple instances and provides the option of creating more than one contact record using the same form.

We've redirected you to the first page of results. To avoid using vast amounts of memory, AtoM limits pagination to %1% records. To view the last records in the current result set, try changing the sort direction.
